column4: Ok.. having an issue.. installed a motherboard with the NVidia nForce 630A MCP chipset but almost everything (including video card) in 'lspci' is "Unknown Device"
I have no specific recomendation - however NVIDIA website has preety well developed LINUX drivers - with very clear instructions how to install them
aptitude does not have a package called nvidia
yes, for the video drivers.. but these are nForce motherboard issues Im worrying about
